author: Amanda Yeo
title: 'Two bongs away': Stephen Colbert localises coronavirus distancing guidelines for U.S. states
description: The coronavirus has infected over 300,000 people and caused over 8,000 deaths in the U.S. thus far, with many more cases expected. Despite this, President Donald Trump still hasn't issued a national stay-at-home order, instead leaving such matters to the indi…
